column1: #Text=Zuko says : " Why did n't you tell those guys who we were ? "
#Text=Azula says : " I guess I was intrigued .
#Text=" Azula says : " Yes , I know , and I love it .
#Text=But , for once , I just wanted to see how people would treat us if they did n't know who we were .
#Text=" Li says : " Like waves washing away the footprints on the sand , Ember Island gives everyone a clean slate .
#Text=" Lo says : " Ember Island reveals the true you .
#Text=" Lo and Li says : " To the party !
